data.title: Sunway University, Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia
data.meta_description: Sunway University is one of Malaysia’s leading private universities located in Petaling Jaya, Kuala Lumpur, and is relatively young by global standards, but is already ranked within the top 2% of universities in the world. The University offers a wide range of industry-relevant business, science and technology programmes at undergraduate and postgraduate levels. The University also engage in research collaborations with leading international universities including joint research centres.
data.text:
Sunway University

A Class Above

Sunway University is one of Malaysia’s leading private universities located in Petaling Jaya, Kuala Lumpur. It is relatively young by global standards, but is already ranked within the top 2% of universities in the world. The University offers a wide range of industry-relevant business, science, and technology programmes at undergraduate and postgraduate levels.

The University also engages in research collaborations with leading international universities including joint research centres. The University publishes textbooks and research books through Sunway University Press which is a leading academic publisher in the region.

“What is done in love is done well.”

I have always kept these words by Vincent van Gogh close to me as I navigate life in university and eventually the adult world. Debate is a huge part of my life, and it has given me so much: life-long relationships, confidence in myself, a love for learning, and so on. Van Gogh’s words serve as a reminder not only for me to seek fulfilment in whatever I do; they remind me if there is someone else out there who might share the same love for something as I do, I have a duty to make sure they have an opportunity for it.

Shireen Ali Fahed Qassem Abu Nejra

Bachelor of Science (Honours) Biomedicine

"Philosophers have hitherto only interpreted the world in various ways; the point is to change it."

This is a powerful quote by Karl Marx. It reminds me that we have a responsibility not just to interpret the world, but to actively work towards changing it for the better.

I would never want any other kid out there experiencing the lack of exposure or know-how in reaching their full potential. Ergo; I have pledged to support other under privileged, underserved, and underrepresented students out there.

Chow Shenn Kuan

Bachelor of Science (Hons) Business Studies

“Life’s most persistent and urgent question is, what are you doing for others?”

This quote by Martin Luther King resonates strongly because the ability to help one another and bring about a positive impact is important to me.

Community service has helped me develop a sense of social responsibility. In other words, to build the "heart" of giving back. Giving back to the community adds purpose to my life and often makes me feel good about myself.

Shamalan Rajesvaran

Bachelor of Information Systems (Honours) (Data Analytics)

Sustainability

Sunway University is dedicated to championing sustainability efforts within and around the campus by instilling sustainable practices into the various aspects of the university experience such as ensuring high standards in sustainability research, sustainable work practices and sustainable consumption.
